ObjectStates.Name: HandTrigger
ObjectStates.XmlUI:
<!-- include Figures/Summon.xml -->
<Panel id="Frame" scale="0.2 0.2">
  <Defaults>
    <Button onClick="onClick" fontSize="80" fontStyle="Bold" textColor="#FFFFFF" color="#00000000"/>
    <Text fontSize="80" fontStyle="Bold" color="#FFFFFF" outline="#000000"/>
  </Defaults>
  <Panel>
    <!-- include ../Frames/HealthBar.xml -->
    <Panel id="HealthBar" active="false">
      <Panel color="#000000" height="100" width="600">
        <ProgressBar id="progressBar" height="90" width="590" showPercentageText="false" color="#000000" percentage="100" fillImageColor="#710000">
          <!-- Defeat monster at 0 hp -->
          <Panel id="defeatPanel" height="100" width="600" offsetXY="0 0" active="false">
            <Button onClick="defeatClick" text="Defeat"/>
          </Panel>
          <!-- Health Bar -->
          <HorizontalLayout>
            <Panel id="healthSubPanel" active="true" width="30">
              <Button id="subHP" onClick="hits(sub)" text="-"></Button>
            </Panel>
            <Panel id="healthSubMaxPanel" active="false" width="30">
              <Button id="subMax" onClick="hits(subMax)" text="◄"></Button>
            </Panel>
            <Panel id="health" width="300">
              <Text id="healthText" width="600"></Text>
            </Panel>
            <Panel id="healthAddMaxPanel" active="false" width="30">
              <Button id="addMax" onClick="hits(addMax)" text="►"></Button>
            </Panel>
            <Panel id="healthAddPanel" active="true" width="30">
              <Button id="addHP" onClick="hits(add)" text="+"></Button>
            </Panel>
          </HorizontalLayout>
          <Button id="editButton" onClick="toggleEditHealth" width="300"></Button>
        </ProgressBar>
      </Panel>
    </Panel>

    <!-- include ../Frames/HealthBar.xml -->
  </Panel>
  <!-- Combat stats display -->
  <Panel id="statsTop" height="100" width="600" padding="0" offsetXY="0 115" active="true">
    <HorizontalLayout height="100" width="600" spacing="10" childAlignment="MiddleCenter">
      <!-- Movement -->
      <Panel id="movePanel" minWidth="100" height="100">
        <HorizontalLayout childForceExpandWidth="false" childAlignment="MiddleCenter">
          <Panel id="moving" minWidth="80" active="true">
            <Image id="moveIcon" image="" preserveAspect="true" outline="#000000"/>
          </Panel>
          <Text id="moveVal" text="" fontSize="70" minWidth="50"/>
        </HorizontalLayout>
      </Panel>

      <!-- Attack Panel -->
      <Panel id="attackPanel" minWidth="100" height="100">
        <HorizontalLayout childForceExpandWidth="false" childAlignment="MiddleCenter">
          <Panel minWidth="80">
            <Image id="attackIcon" image="Attack-W" preserveAspect="true" outline="#000000"/>
          </Panel>
          <Text id="attackVal" fontSize="70" minWidth="50"/>
          <Panel id="targetAreaPanel" minWidth="80" active="false">
            <Image image="TargetArea" preserveAspect="true"/>
          </Panel>
        </HorizontalLayout>
      </Panel>

      <!-- Range Panel -->
      <Panel id="rangePanel" minWidth="100" height="100">
        <HorizontalLayout childForceExpandWidth="false" childAlignment="MiddleCenter">
          <Panel minWidth="60" offsetXY="0 -5">
            <Image id="rangeIcon" image="Range-W" preserveAspect="true" outline="#000000"/>
          </Panel>
          <Text id="rangeVal" fontSize="70" color="#FFFFFF" outline="#000000"/>
        </HorizontalLayout>
      </Panel>
    </HorizontalLayout>
  </Panel>

  <Panel id="statsBottom" height="400" width="600" offsetXY="0 -250" active="true">
    <Defaults>
      <Image class="effect-image" preferredWidth="100" preferredHeight="100" preserveAspect="true" image=""
             active="false"/>
      <Text class="effect-text" fontSize="50" resizeTextForBestFit="true" color="#FFFFFF" text="" active="false"/>
    </Defaults>
    <VerticalLayout childForceExpandWidth="false" spacing="5" childForceExpandHeight="false"
                    childAlignment="UpperCenter">
      <!-- Effects Panel -->
      <HorizontalLayout id="attackEffectsPanel" prefferedHeight="100" preferredWidth="600"
                        spacing="10" active="false"
                        childForceExpandWidth="false" childForceExpandHeight="false" childAlignment="MiddleCenter">
        <Image id="attack-effect-1" class="effect-image"/>
        <Text id="attack-effect-1-value" class="effect-text"/>
        <Image id="attack-effect-2" class="effect-image"/>
        <Text id="attack-effect-2-value" class="effect-text"/>
        <Image id="attack-effect-3" class="effect-image"/>
        <Text id="attack-effect-3-value" class="effect-text"/>
        <Image id="attack-effect-4" class="effect-image"/>
        <Text id="attack-effect-4-value" class="effect-text"/>
        <Image id="attack-effect-5" class="effect-image"/>
        <Text id="attack-effect-5-value" class="effect-text"/>
        <Image id="attack-effect-6" class="effect-image"/>
        <Text id="attack-effect-6-value" class="effect-text"/>
        <Image id="attack-effect-6" class="effect-image"/>
        <Text id="attack-effect-6-value" class="effect-text"/>
        <Image id="attack-effect-7" class="effect-image"/>
        <Text id="attack-effect-7-value" class="effect-text"/>
        <Image id="attack-effect-8" class="effect-image"/>
        <Text id="attack-effect-8-value" class="effect-text"/>
        <Image id="attack-effect-9" class="effect-image"/>
        <Text id="attack-effect-9-value" class="effect-text"/>
        <Image id="attack-effect-10" class="effect-image"/>
        <Text id="attack-effect-10-value" class="effect-text"/>
      </HorizontalLayout>

      <!-- Immunities Panel -->
      <HorizontalLayout id="immunitiesPanel" prefferedHeight="100" prefferedWidth="600"
                        spacing="10" active="false"
                        childForceExpandWidth="false" childForceExpandHeight="false" childAlignment="MiddleCenter">
        <Image id="immunity-1" class="effect-image"/>
        <Image id="immunity-2" class="effect-image"/>
        <Image id="immunity-3" class="effect-image"/>
        <Image id="immunity-4" class="effect-image"/>
        <Image id="immunity-5" class="effect-image"/>
        <Image id="immunity-6" class="effect-image"/>
        <Image id="immunity-7" class="effect-image"/>
        <Image id="immunity-8" class="effect-image"/>
        <Image id="immunity-9" class="effect-image"/>
        <Image id="immunity-10" class="effect-image"/>
      </HorizontalLayout>

      <Panel id="textEffectPanel" preferredHeight="100" preferredWidth="600" active="false">
        <Text id="textEffect" resizeTextForBestFit="true" color="#FFFFFF" outline="#000000"/>
      </Panel>
    </VerticalLayout>
  </Panel>

  <!-- Monster number / customization button -->
  <Panel id="monsterNumber" height="200" width="150" offsetXY="-390 -20">
    <Panel id="numberSubPanel" active="false" width="30">
      <Button id="subNumber" width="150" offsetXY="0 -110" onClick="subNumber" text="▼" textColor="#FFFFFF">▼</Button>
    </Panel>
    <Panel id="numberAddPanel" active="false" width="30">
      <Button id="addNumber" width="150" offsetXY="0 110" onClick="addNumber" text="▲" textColor="#FFFFFF">▲</Button>
    </Panel>
    <Image id="number" height="150" width="150" image="1" offsetXY="0 0" preserveAspect="true"/>
  </Panel>

  <Panel id="summonPanel" height="200" width="150" offsetXY="390 -20">
    <Image id="summonIcon" active="false" height="150" width="150" image="S" offsetXY="0 0"
           preserveAspect="true"/>
  </Panel>

  <!-- Status effects display -->
  <Panel offsetXY="0 325">
    <!-- include ../Frames/ConditionsPanel.xml -->
    <Panel id="statePanel" height="260" width="-5">
      <VerticalLayout>
        <HorizontalLayout id="Conditions" spacing="5">
        </HorizontalLayout>
      </VerticalLayout>
    </Panel>

    <!-- include ../Frames/ConditionsPanel.xml -->
  </Panel>
</Panel>

<!-- include Figures/Summon.xml -->
